text: This character has pledged himself to a crusade as a reigning ruler, fighting and winning at least one battle whilst on crusade.
This character is a veteran crusader, fighting and winning several battles whilst on crusade as a ruler.
This character's renown and religious zeal are peerless, as they have fought and won a great many battles whilst on crusade as a ruler.
This unfortunate soul is stricken with the Black Death, assuredly a death sentence.

This character has answered the call to defend against a crusade, fighting and winning at least one battle against the crusaders.
This character is a veteran mujahid, fighting and winning several battles against the crusaders.
This character's renown and religious zeal are peerless, as they have fought and won a great many battles against the crusaders.
